title: Israel: Supreme Court Holds Police May Not Search Computer Material Based on Suspect’s Consent Without Judicial Warrant
description: On August 31, 2025, Israel’s Supreme Court, sitting as a High Court of Justice, ruled that the Israel Police was not authorized to search a person’s computer material (software or stored information) or mobile phone without a judicial warrant, even though the…
